title: What if 2020 was never an apocalypse year? - Quora

response.answer_text: It Really Is Tho. 2020 Fits Perfectly Into Everything. Maybe Even If, The Term Apocalypse Is A Bit Harsh. Think More Of A Year Of Great Change. Of Course Everything Is Happening Right Now. Its Biblical. 2020 Is Going To Be Our Year Of Victory. People Will Cry When They Look Back At What Was Created From What We Have Right Now. Maybe Even If, Its All Gonna Happen Sooner Than Later.

2020 is not an apocalypse year Link, the apocalypse is yet to happen. But we are heading in that direction with anthropogenic global warming & climate change & our continued burning of fossil fuels. We will likely see the collapse of society, TEOTWAWKI, & then the beginning of our extinction period in the not too distant future.
